Our main client is EPAM and its clients. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"GSD is divided into units, which have their own specific set of responsibilities.
